thumb.title: Serious Fusion / 重音テト
thumb.description: 投稿者名：まさよし動画のタイトル名の読み：しりあすふゅーじょんStreaming & Download：15th Album「清巫女現れた」https://link-map.jp/links/W7eK61wF作詞作曲：まさよし歌詞：At first it was just a lonely life formIsolated AlienatedI desperately wanted to get out of this situationUnleashing my potentialEverything around me is gradually drawn to meMerging one after anotherTo fill the sadnessI am not alone anymoreBecause we are a fusionHow many life forms have we merged with since becoming a fusionWe strongly desired not to merge any furtherUnleashing our potentialEverything around us is gradually drawn to usMerging one after anotherTo fill the sadnessI am not alone anymoreBecause we are a fusionAt first it was just a lonely life formWe want to go backWe desperately wanted to get out of this situation■ボカコレ2025夏ex参加曲です。『The VOCALOID Collection（ボカコレ）』はボカロ文化をきっかけに生まれたインターネット等で活動するクリエイターやユーザー、企業などボカロに関わる全ての方が参加できるボカロ文化の祭典です。https://vocaloid-collection.jp/
